title: How to Check for Color Fastness

steps.headline: Wet one corner of the garment or fabric item.
Leave it for a few minutes.
steps.description: Rest it over the laundry sink while you wait.

steps.headline: Get a white cloth or face washer.
steps.description: Press the wet part of the garment onto the white cloth. If any color comes off onto the white cloth, you know that the item is not colorfast and will run in the wash.

steps.headline: Wash separately from other clothing until there is no more dye running from it.
